Name: Scary Turnaround
About the game: The first thing you do is turn on your flashlight, on F. While walking in the mountains, you fall into a cave. There is practically no light in it, you will have to find your way out of it by exploring the abandoned rooms of what was once a laboratory. As you explore, you'll need to find the key that will open the door to your freedom. First person game with horror elements. Explore the dungeon and its rooms, collect batteries for your flashlight. Darkness can conceal a variety of mysteries. Control in the game WASD - movement, left mouse button - pick up and use the subject. Right mouse button - zoom in. Features: - pleasant graphics; - simple controls; - interesting gameplay; - light music;
